content: *keep your children s hands warm but with the freedom to play for skateboarding or biking or just hanging out with friends these fingerless gloves will be a hit they are so easy to crochet you can make several pair in colors to match his favorite outfits from the book crochet kid stuff by sharon mann & phyllis sandford courtesy of creative publishing international lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # fingerlessgloves skill level beginner + level 2 size small 6-1/2 16 5 cm cuff to top medium 7-1/4 18 4 cm cuff to top gauge 5 sts = 1 2 5 cm on 6/g hook 4 sts = 1 2 5 cm on 8/h hook wool-ease® article #620 3 colors 1 ball each *ranch red black grey heather* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm *for small size* crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm *for medium size* single_crochet u s colorwork instructions are written cuff is worked flat then seamed palm is worked in rounds
